info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, northeastern Yalobusha and northwestern Calhoun Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paris, or 7 miles east of Water Valley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bruce, Banner, Paris, Pine Valley, Ellard and Sarepta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
